description: This is a Java source file defining the SensorDeviceShell class, which provides command-line shell commands for managing sensor devices within a mock Zigbee core system, including listing, adding, faulting, tampering, and checking sensors.

classes.name: SensorDeviceShell
classes.description: A Spring Shell component providing commands for managing sensor devices in a Zigbee-like system.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Lists all registered sensors in a table format.

methods.name: addSensor
methods.description: Adds a new sensor of type MockIASSensor with a specified or default name.

methods.name: addLegacySensor
methods.description: Adds a new legacy door/window sensor of type MockLegacyDoorWindowSensor.

methods.name: fault
methods.description: Marks a specified sensor as faulted.

methods.name: restore
methods.description: Restores a specified sensor from a faulted state.

methods.name: faultToggle
methods.description: Toggles the faulted state of a sensor.

methods.name: tamper
methods.description: Marks a sensor as tampered.

methods.name: tamperRestore
methods.description: Restores a sensor from a tampered state.

methods.name: tamperToggle
methods.description: Toggles the tampered state of a sensor.

methods.name: lowBattery
methods.description: Sets a sensor as having a low battery.

methods.name: lowBatteryRestore
methods.description: Restores a sensor from a low battery state.

methods.name: lowBatteryToggle
methods.description: Toggles the low battery status of a sensor.

methods.name: sendCheckin
methods.description: Triggers a poll control check-in for a sensor.

inner_classes.name: SensorDeviceShell.NameValueProvider
inner_classes.description: Provides device name options for sensor commands, based on MockLegacyDoorWindowSensor type.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Displays all sensors with their statuses in a table.

methods.name: addSensor
methods.description: Creates and adds a new MockIASSensor with the provided or default name.

methods.name: addLegacySensor
methods.description: Creates and adds a new MockLegacyDoorWindowSensor with the provided or default name.

methods.name: fault
methods.description: Marks a specified sensor as faulted.

methods.name: restore
methods.description: Restores a specified sensor from faulted state.

methods.name: faultToggle
methods.description: Toggles the faulted state of a sensor.

methods.name: tamper
methods.description: Marks a sensor as tampered.

methods.name: tamperRestore
methods.description: Restores a tampered sensor.

methods.name: tamperToggle
methods.description: Toggles the tampered state of a sensor.

methods.name: lowBattery
methods.description: Marks a sensor with low battery.

methods.name: lowBatteryRestore
methods.description: Removes the low battery status from a sensor.

methods.name: lowBatteryToggle
methods.description: Toggles low battery status.

methods.name: sendCheckin
methods.description: Triggers a check-in for a sensor.
